author: davidein
content: Back in Vegas for summer vacation part 2.  Today, I play the Main Event.  Back to history...White Sweatshirt with my kids' good hands.

author: davidein
content:
I'm playing the main event for the Michael J Fox foundation.  http://t.co/yYFVL2ZI4I. #cure Parkinson's.
5 hours to game time.

author: davidein
content: I'm good to go.  Table 371.  Such a rush...when patience is the prescription.  Makes it fun.

author: davidein
content: First break.  All small pots. Started with 30k now at 31.2k.  They play is sooo much faster than one drop. Get many more hands!

author: davidein
content: 2nd break.  Losing an evil amount of small pots.  21k.
